trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all data source view classes, which define the capabilities of data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklasse for alle datakilde visningen klasser, som definerer mulighetene for kilde kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports a data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET støtter en arkitektur med databinding aktiverer webkontroller server til å binde til data i en konsekvent måte.

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Webserverkontroller binde til data kalles databundet kontroller og klassene som gjør det mulig at bindingen kalles datakilde-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller kilde kan representere en datakilde: en relasjonsdatabase, en fil, en dataflyt, et objekt for business og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kontrollerer finnes data på en konsekvent måte til databindingselementer kontroller, uavhengig av kilde- eller formatet for de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, to perform most Web development tasks.
trans-unit.target: Du bruke datakilde kontrollene som følger med ASP.NET, inkludert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, til å utføre de fleste Web utvikling oppgaver.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You use the base <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> and DataSourceView classes when you want to implement your own custom data source control.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>og DataSourceView klasser når du ønsker å implementere egendefinerte dataene kildetabellen kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: You can think of a data source control as the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> object and its associated lists of data, called data source views.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se til en kilde-kontroll for data som en kombinasjon av det <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>objektet og de tilknyttede listene med data, kalt datakildevisninger.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Each list of data is represented by a DataSourceView object.
trans-unit.target: Hver dataliste representeres av et DataSourceView-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceView class is the base class for all data source views, or lists of data, associated with data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataSourceView er basisklasse for alle datakildevisninger eller lister med data som er tilknyttet datakildekontroller.

trans-unit.source: Data source views define the capabilities of a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Datakildevisninger Definer mulighetene for en datakilde-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a data source control is always associated with one or more named data source views.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den underliggende datalagring inneholder én eller flere lister med data, er alltid en kilde-kontroll for data knyttet til én eller flere navngitte datakildevisninger.

trans-unit.source: The data source control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> method to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> method to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name.
trans-unit.target: Bruker datakildekontrollen i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>metode for å liste opp dataene kilde visninger som er tilknyttet datakildekontrollen data og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A>metode for å hente en bestemt datakildeforekomst for visningen etter navn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: All DataSourceView objects support data retrieval from the underlying data source using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alle objekter som DataSourceView støtter henting av data fra den underliggende datakilde som bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: All views optionally support a basic set of operations, including operations such as <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Alle visninger eventuelt støtter et grunnleggende sett med operasjoner, inkludert operasjoner som <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control can discover the capabilities of a data source control by retrieving an associated data source view using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> methods, and by querying the view at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: En databundet kontroll kan oppdage vise mulighetene for en datakilde-kontroll ved å hente en tilknyttet-datakilde ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>metoder, og ved å spørre visningen på utformingen eller kjøretid.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kontrollere som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objektet støtter det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: The CanDelete property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanDelete gjenspeiler ikke bare en funksjon kontrollens datakilden, men også om det er for øyeblikket passende å utføre en operasjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, even though a data source view supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A> operation in general, if a required property or some other data is not set, the CanDelete property returns `false`, as a delete operation would fail.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel selv om en datakilde vise støtter det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>operasjonen Generelt, hvis en obligatorisk egenskap eller andre data ikke er angitt, CanDelete returnerer egenskapen `false`, som en sletting vil mislykkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen implementeringen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified command can be executed.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte kommandoen kan utføres.

trans-unit.source: The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command can be executed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kommandoen kan kjøres. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objektet støtter det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: The CanInsert property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanInsert gjenspeiler ikke bare en funksjon kontrollens datakilden, men også om det er for øyeblikket passende å utføre en operasjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, even though a data source control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A> operation, if a required insert command or some other data is not set, the CanInsert property returns `false`, as an insert operation would fail.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel selv om kontrollen et data-kilden støtter det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>operasjon, hvis en nødvendig Sett inn kommando eller andre data er ikke angitt, CanInsert returnerer egenskapen `false`, som en insert-operasjonen vil mislykkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen implementeringen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports paging through the data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objektet støtter Bla gjennom dataene som ble hentet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control can request paging by adding the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> field to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En databundet kontroll kan be om Bla ved å legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>felt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: If a data-bound control requests paging, but the CanPage property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en databundet kontroll forespørsler Bla, men egenskapen CanPage returnerer `false`, datakildevisningen oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen implementeringen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports retrieving the total number of data rows, instead of the data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objektet støtter henting av antall datarader, i stedet for dataene.

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control can request a total row count by adding the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> field to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments?displayProperty=fullName> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En databundet kontroll kan be om en Totalt antall rader ved å legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>felt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments?displayProperty=fullName>objekt sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a data-bound control requests a total row count, but the CanRetrieveTotalRowCount property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en databundet kontroll ber om en Totalt antall rader, men egenskapen CanRetrieveTotalRowCount returnerer `false`, datakildevisningen oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen implementeringen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objektet støtter en sorterte visning på den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control can request sorting by adding the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> field to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En databundet kontroll kan be om sortering ved å legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>felt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: If a data-bound control requests sorting, but the CanSort property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en databundet kontrollere forespørsler sortering, men returnerer CanSort `false`, datakildevisningen oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> object supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> objektet støtter det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The CanUpdate property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanUpdate gjenspeiler ikke bare en funksjon kontrollens datakilden, men også om det er for øyeblikket passende å utføre en operasjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, even though a data-bound control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A> operation, if a required update command or some other data is not set, the CanUpdate property returns `false`, as an update operation would fail.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel selv om en databundet kontroll støtter det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>operasjon, hvis en påkrevd oppdateringskommando eller andre data ikke er angitt, CanUpdate returnerer egenskapen `false`, som en oppdateringen vil mislykkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når datakildevisningen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The change to the data source view could be due to a change in the values of its properties, or to a change in the data due to a data operation performed by the data source view.
trans-unit.target: Endringen datakildevisningen kan være på grunn av en endring i verdier for egenskapene, eller til en endring i dataene på grunn av en ble utført av datakildevisningen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Performs an asynchronous delete operation on the list of data that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en asynkron sletteoperasjonen i listen med data som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt representerer.

trans-unit.source: The Delete method is the asynchronous data deletion interface for all data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Delete er asynkron sletting grensesnittet for alle datakilde visningen objekter.

trans-unit.source: The Delete method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A> method using any `keys` and `oldValues` parameter values supplied.
trans-unit.target: Slett metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>metoden ved hjelp av en `keys` og `oldValues` parameterverdier som er angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den `callback` parameteren er representant som en databundet kontroll sender til datakilden visning, som brukes til å varsle databundet kontrollere når den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method uses the parameters of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback> delegate to return the number of affected records and any <xref:System.Exception> exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden bruker parameterne for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback>representant til å returnere antall påvirkede poster og alle <xref:System.Exception>unntak som er et av de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of object or row keys to be deleted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for objekt- eller nøkler som skal slettes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og de opprinnelige verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"> </xref> representanten som brukes til å varsle en databundet kontroll når den asynkrone operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of event-handler delegates for the data source view.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over hendelsesbehandlingen representanter for datakildevisningen.

trans-unit.source: This property is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>, which uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>, som bruker et lineært søkealgoritmen til å finne oppføringer i listen over representanter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>

trans-unit.source: A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries.
trans-unit.target: Et lineært Søk-algoritmen er tidkrevende når du arbeider med et stort antall oppføringer.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries with this property will be slow.
trans-unit.target: Derfor når du har en stor liste, finne poster med denne egenskapen vil derfor være treg.

trans-unit.source: The list of event-handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: Listen over hendelsesbehandlingen representanter.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified command.
trans-unit.target: Utfører den angitte kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of object keys or row keys to act on.
trans-unit.target: En ordliste for objektet nøkler eller rad nøkler kan brukes på.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their values.
trans-unit.target: En ordliste for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og tilhørende verdier.

trans-unit.source: The number of items that were affected by the operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer som er berørt av operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified command.
trans-unit.target: Utfører den angitte kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: This method does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer ikke en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of object keys or row keys to act on.
trans-unit.target: En ordliste for objektet nøkler eller rad nøkler kan brukes på.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their values.
trans-unit.target: En ordliste for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og tilhørende verdier.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Performs a delete operation on the list of data that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en sletting i listen med data som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt representerer.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls can determine whether the ExecuteDelete operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kontroller kan fastsette om ExecuteDelete-operasjonen støttes av en datakilde-kontroll ved å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objektet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: Den `keys` parameteren representerer objekt- eller nøklene for dataene du vil slette.

trans-unit.source: For data sources that represent relational data, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys.
trans-unit.target: For datakilder som representerer relasjonsdata, som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontroll, den `keys` parameteren er en samling av databasen primærnøkler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data.
trans-unit.target: I andre tilfeller den `keys` parameteren er en samling med navn/verdi-par, og brukes til å filtrere en liste med data.

trans-unit.source: Any data matching a name/value pair is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Alle data som samsvarer med et navn/verdi-par slettes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class's default implementation is to throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klassens standard implementering er skal returneres en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class, override the ExecuteDelete method if your class supports deletion from the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klasse, overstyre metoden ExecuteDelete Hvis klassen støtter slettes fra underliggende datalageret.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of object or row keys to be deleted by the ExecuteDelete operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for objekt- eller nøkler som skal slettes i ExecuteDelete-operasjonen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og de opprinnelige verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The number of items that were deleted from the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer som ble slettet fra underliggende datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The ExecuteDelete operation is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: ExecuteDelete-operasjonen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs an insert operation on the list of data that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en insert-operasjon for listen med data som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt representerer.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls can determine whether the ExecuteInsert operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> method, and checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanInsert%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kontroller kan fastsette om ExecuteInsert-operasjonen støttes av en datakilde-kontroll ved å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objektet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A>metoden og kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanInsert%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanInsert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The `values` parameter is a set of name/value pairs that represents data columns or fields and corresponding values to insert.
trans-unit.target: Den `values` parameteren er et sett med navn/verdi-par som representerer datakolonner eller felt og tilhørende verdier skal settes inn.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class's default implementation is to throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klassens standard implementering er skal returneres en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class, override the ExecuteInsert method if your class supports insertion into the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klasse, overstyre metoden ExecuteInsert Hvis klassen støtter innsetting i underliggende datalageret.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs used during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-par brukes under en insert-operasjonen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The number of items that were inserted into the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer som er satt inn i den underliggende lagring av data.

trans-unit.source: The ExecuteInsert operation is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: ExecuteInsert-operasjonen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of data from the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste med data fra underliggende datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The ExecuteSelect method is called to retrieve data from the underlying data store and return it as an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden UtførValg kalles for å hente data fra underliggende datalager helt og Tilbakestill den som en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: All data source controls support data retrieval from their underlying data storage, even if other operations such as insertion and sorting are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Alle datakildekontroller støtter henting av data fra de underliggende datalagring, selv om andre operasjoner, for eksempel innsetting og sortering ikke støttes.

trans-unit.source: Because a data-bound control can request a list of data at any time as a result of a <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged> event or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method call, the data retrieval must be performed on demand.
trans-unit.target: Fordi en databundet kontroll kan be om en liste over data når som helst som et resultat av en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged>hendelse eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>metodekall, datahenting må utføres ved behov.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> som brukes til å be om operasjoner i data utenfor grunnleggende datahenting.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> list of data from the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>liste over data fra underliggende datalageret.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Performs an update operation on the list of data that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en oppdateringsoperasjon i listen med data som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt representerer.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls can determine whether the ExecuteUpdate operation is supported by a data source control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object and checking the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kontroller kan fastsette om ExecuteUpdate-operasjonen støttes av en datakilde-kontroll ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekt og kontrollere verdien til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to update.
trans-unit.target: Den `keys` parameteren representerer objekt- eller nøklene i dataene for å vise.

trans-unit.source: For data sources that represent relational data, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys.
trans-unit.target: For datakilder som representerer relasjonsdata, som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontroll, den `keys` parameteren er en samling av databasen primærnøkler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data.
trans-unit.target: I andre tilfeller den `keys` parameteren er en samling med navn/verdi-par, og brukes til å filtrere en liste med data.

trans-unit.source: Any data matching a name/value pair is updated with the values found in the `values` parameter, which is a set of name/value pairs that represents new values for existing fields or columns.
trans-unit.target: Alle data som samsvarer med et navn/verdi-paret er oppdatert med verdiene i den `values` parameter som er et sett med navn/verdi-par som representerer nye verdier for eksisterende felt eller kolonner.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class's default implementation is to throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klassens standard implementering er skal returneres en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class, override the ExecuteUpdate method if your class supports updating data in the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klasse, overstyre metoden ExecuteUpdate Hvis klassen støtter oppdaterer dataene i den underliggende datalagring.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of object or row keys to be updated by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for objekt- eller nøkler oppdateres av oppdateringen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their new values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og nye verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og de opprinnelige verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The number of items that were updated in the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer som ble oppdatert i underliggende datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The ExecuteUpdate operation is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: ExecuteUpdate-operasjonen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs an asynchronous insert operation on the list of data that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en asynkron innsetting i listen med data som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt representerer.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method is the asynchronous data insertion interface for all data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Insert-metoden, er asynkront innsetting grensesnittet for alle datakilde Vis objekter.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A> method using any `values` supplied.
trans-unit.target: Sett inn metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>metoden ved hjelp av en `values` angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den `callback` parameteren er representant som en databundet kontroll sender til datakilden visning, som brukes til å varsle databundet kontrollere når den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method uses the parameters of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback> delegate to return the number of affected records and any <xref:System.Exception> exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Metoden bruker parameterne for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback>representant til å returnere antall påvirkede poster og alle <xref:System.Exception>unntak som er et av de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>metodekallet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs used during an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-par brukes under en insert-operasjonen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"> </xref> representanten som brukes til å varsle en databundet kontroll når den asynkrone operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data source view.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på datakildevisningen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref>, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref>, hvis det er en.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary work.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged varsler en databundet kontroll at den underliggende datakilden er endret, og at kontrollen skal binde og utføre nødvendige arbeid.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the OnDataSourceViewChanged method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged kalles når en egenskap for datakildevisningen er endret.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError*> method to compare the capabilities requested for an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> operation against those that the view supports.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av den <> </> *> metode til å sammenligne funksjonene forespurt for en <> </> *> operasjonen mot dem som støtter visningen.

trans-unit.source: The RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError method is used by the data source view to examine each of the capabilities requested by a data-bound control, represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%2A> method, and compare it to the capabilities supported by the data source view.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError brukes av datakildevisningen for å undersøke hver med funksjoner som ble forespurt av en databundet kontroll, som representerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%2A>metoden og sammenligne den til funksjonene som støttes av datakildevisningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities"></xref> values that is compared against the capabilities that the view supports.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities"> </xref> verdier sammenlignes med funksjoner som støtter visningen.

trans-unit.source: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.
trans-unit.target: Datakildevisningen støtter ikke datakilde funksjonen som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of data asynchronously from the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Henter en dataliste asynkront fra underliggende datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The Select method is the asynchronous data retrieval interface for all data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Velg metoden er asynkron henting grensesnittet for alle datakilde visningen objekter.

trans-unit.source: The Select method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method, passing any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> supplied.
trans-unit.target: Velg metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>metoden sending av en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den `callback` parameteren er representant som en databundet kontroll sender til datakilden visning, som brukes til å varsle databundet kontrollere når den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> call is returned in the parameter of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>kall returneres i parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback>delegere.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> som brukes til å be om operasjoner i data utenfor grunnleggende datahenting.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback"></xref> delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback"> </xref> representanten som brukes til å varsle en databundet kontroll når den asynkrone operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs an asynchronous update operation on the list of data that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en asynkron oppdateringen i listen med data som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt representerer.

trans-unit.source: The Update method is the asynchronous data modification interface for all data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Update-metoden er asynkron endring grensesnittet for alle datakilde visningen objekter.

trans-unit.source: The Update method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A> method using any `keys`, `values`, and `oldValues` parameter values supplied.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringen metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>metoden ved hjelp av en `keys`, `values`, og `oldValues` parameterverdier som er angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den `callback` parameteren er representant som en databundet kontroll sender til datakilden visning, som brukes til å varsle databundet kontrollere når den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method uses the parameters of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback> delegate to return the number of affected records and any <xref:System.Exception> exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Metoden bruker parameterne for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback>representant til å returnere antall påvirkede poster og alle <xref:System.Exception>unntak som er et av de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A>kall.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of object or row keys to be updated by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for objekt- eller nøkler oppdateres av oppdateringen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their new values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og nye verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>for navn/verdi-parene som representerer dataelementer og de opprinnelige verdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"> </xref> representanten som brukes til å varsle en databundet kontroll når den asynkrone operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback"></xref> supplied is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
